rows.label: tlk41400072_03_msg0001
rows.name:
I believe one day we'll get word that
the war is over.

rows.label: tlk41400072_03_msg0002
rows.name:
I believe we'll all get to go home, me 
and the other refugees.

rows.label: tlk41400072_03_msg0003
rows.name:
I guess I can keep my spirits up every
day because I believe peace will come.

rows.label: tlk41400072_03_msg0004
rows.name:
So people like you - with Blades - have
to keep working towards that peace.
People like me are counting on you.
